offerDetails.name: Spacetalk Kids Smartphone Watch and GPS - Grey
offerDetails.description: Use requires AllMyTribe App and in-app subscription, at least $6.99 a month. Be able to stay in touch with your kid without having to give them their first smartphone. The Spacetalk kids watch lets your kid call, send voice messages, text messages and emojis straight from the watch.

group.name: Spacetalk Kids Smartphone Watch and GPS

entitlements.name: Unlimited NZ SMS*
Unlimited mins to Spark mobiles and NZ landlines
40GB data at max speed. Endless data at reduced speed*

offerDetails.name: Spacetalk Adventurer Kids Smartphone Watch - Ocean
offerDetails.description: Introducing Adventurer, the brand new Spacetalk kids phone watch + GPS + fitness tracker that takes kids’ independence and parents’ peace of mind to a new level. ’ From your phone, see where they are, manage their contact list, enable school mode (for distraction-free learning), set up safe zones and much more. Using the Spacetalk Smartwatch requires a subscription to the Spacetalk app. The app costs at minimum $6.99/month. Download the Spacetalk app from the App Store or Google Play.

entitlements.name: Unlimited NZ SMS*
Unlimited mins to Spark mobiles and NZ landlines
40GB data at max speed. Endless data at reduced speed*
